title: I'm Married To A Narcissist
itunes:title: I'm Married To A Narcissist
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am in need of some sound advice. I got married 6½ months ago after reuniting with my man. We had an on and off relationship for years and he started seeing a woman that catered to his big personality. She dumped him and he came running back to me. After he begged me to give him another shot, I took him back and we got engaged. As soon as he put the ring on my finger, his personality started to change, but I married him anyway....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

As soon as he put the ring on my finger, his personality started to change, but I married him anyway....................
